text: Ciro Ferreira Gomes (born 6 November 1957 in Pindamonhangaba, São Paulo) is a Brazilian politician, lawyer, and academic. He is a member of the Democratic Labor Party (PDT). He was the PDT's presidential candidate in the 2018 Brazilian election and again in 2022. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian mayors Category:Politicians from Ceará
title: Ciro Gomes
